lines.text: Hey, are all those Pokémon yours? Make sure you look after them well!
I'll be back to check that you have cared for your Pokémon properly!
Have you seen any sign of Team Rocket? I've heard a rumor they were seen nearby.
You saw Team Rocket in the next town? Ok, thanks! I'm on it!
Watch out for Pokémon thieves. There have been reports of that in this area lately.
You're not one of Pokémon thieves, now are you?
I love my job! I get to look for troublemakers and put things right!
Pokémon thieves, swindlers, all kinds of crooks! Watch out for Officer Jenny!
